description: This strange plant feels slightly oily and smells odd.  The smell seems to change slowly, from loamy earth to a rich vegetal smell to something acrid that burns your nose to an herbal scent, with no discernable pattern.  You're not sure what this is.
//: As the id indicates, this is a triffid spellbook, encoding information using scents and chemical triggers.  There's essentially zero chance of the survivor figuring out how to read it.
